name: Name
heroDescription: This is the hero description that appears below the project name. It provides a brief overview of what the project is about and its main objectives.

overview.description: This is the overview description that explains the project in more detail. It covers the main aspects, challenges, and solutions implemented in this project.

projectGoal.description: This section describes the main goal and objectives of the project. It explains what we aimed to achieve and the problems we solved.

fontAndColours.description: This section explains the font and color choices made for the project, including the reasoning behind the design decisions.

designProcess.description: This section describes the design process followed for this project, including methodologies, tools, and approaches used.

research.description: This describes the research phase of the project, including user research, market analysis, and competitive studies.

gallery.description: This section showcases the final results and key visuals from the project.
